tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AirQualityData ( 
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  location VARCHAR(100), 
  pollutant VARCHAR(50), 
  value DECIMAL, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP 
)

CREATE TABLE air_quality_data (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    pollutant_type VARCHAR(50),
    reading DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  measurement_date TIMESTAMP,
  pm25_level INT,
  pm10_level INT
);
